extension.name: System - User Agent Template Switcher
extension.author: Rene Kreijveld
extension.description:
User Agent Template Switcher

Important: set the order of this plugin to bottom of your system plugin list. If the mobile template does not show on mobile, please clear your browser cache!.

This plugin detects the user agent and can switch to a different template if a mobile device is detected. Based on the original work of BlackRed Designs.
Makes use of mobiledetect, a lightweight PHP class for detecting mobile devices.

Version history:

field.name: mobile_switch_enabled
field.label: Enable Template Switcher
field.description: If set to 'Yes', your Joomla website will use the template set under 'Mobile template' for mobile visitors.

field.name: mobile_template
field.label: Mobile template
field.description: Select the template you want to use on mobile screens.

field.name: include_tablets
field.label: Includes Tablets
field.description: If set to 'Yes', the plugin will also set the template for tablet devices.
